props.name: scrollTo
props.description: Index of item to scroll to

props.name: canScrollLeft
props.description: Render Props: Whether can scroll left

props.name: canScrollRight
props.description: Render Props: Whether can scroll right

props.name: firstVisibleIndex
props.description: Render Props: Index of the first visible item

props.name: lastVisibleIndex
props.description: Render Props: Index of the last visible item

props.name: autoSlideDelay
props.description: Render Props: Interval of auto sliding in milliseconds. No auto sliding if undefined

props.name: isRtl
props.description: Render Props: Set right to left (rtl) view

props.name: isSwipeDragDisabled
props.description: Disable swipe gesture over carousel content for desktop and dragging on mobile devices.
